text: The Love of Mankind () is a 1972 Soviet drama movie directed by Sergey Gerasimov.«Марсианская» архитектура. Лекции «Москино» о домах и планетах в фильмахЛюбить человека It stars Anatoliy Solonitsyn, Lyubov Virolaynen, and Tamara Makarova. == Actors == * Anatoliy Solonitsyn as Dmitri Kalmykov * Lyubov Virolaynen as Mariya * Tamara Makarova as Aleksandra Vasilyeva Petrushkova * Zhanna Bolotova as Tanya Pavlova * Ivan Neganov * Mikhail Zimin * Yury Kuzmenkov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1972 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Sergei Gerasimov
title: The Love of Mankind
